paper.title: Modelling Dynamic Communication Structures in LOTOS

author.org: Swedish Institute of Computer Science, Box 1263, S-164 28 Kista, Sweden
Swedish Institute of Computer Science, Box 1263, S-164 28 Kista, Sweden

paper.venue: Formal Techniques for (Networked and) Distributed Systems
paper.abstract: Abstract We study how to formally specify dynamically changing communication structures in the specification language LOTOS. We present a method for modelling dynamic communication structures by encoding link names as data values together with a sufficient condition on the communication structure guaranteeing that the modelling is possible. As an example we formally specify the handover procedure in the GSM protocols. Using automated tools we prove the specification equivalent with a more abstract description of the system.
